titleStmt.title: The covenant newly revived. In a conference between Mr. Crofton and a converted Scotch parson. Discovering all the whole mistery of iniquity carried on by hare-brain'd faction under pretence of reformation.
titleStmt.author: Crofton, Zachary, 1625 or 6-1672.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
